157: The Grey Moths are beginning to board.
Grey Moth forces began boarding the ship.
Be careful. Retreat immediately if you encounter Herrscher. Never try to fight her.
你们要小心。如果遇到律者千万不要战斗，立刻返回。
気をつけてください。もし律者に遭遇したらくれぐれも戦いは避け、直ちに引き返してください。
조심하세요. 만약 율자를 마주치면 꼭 싸움은 피하고 즉시 돌아오세요.
Be careful. If you encounter a Herrscher, retreat immediately and don't try to engage her.
You should be careful. If you encounter a Ruler do not fight, return immediately.
Be careful. If you encounter a scribe, avoid fighting and turn around immediately.
That depends if she lets us go.
向こうが逃がしてくれればね。
That depends on if she's willing to let us go.
The premise is that she has to let us go.
If only the other side would let us go.
Testing... Hyperion, everything's ready? The gate is about to open.
喂喂…休伯利安准备好了么？闸门马上要开启了。
ねぇ……ハイペリオンの準備はいい？ゲート、開くわよ。
저기……히페리온 준비는 됐어? 게이트, 열 거야.
Testing... Is the Hyperion ready to take off? The gates are about to open.
Hey, hey...is Hubleyan ready? The gates are about to open.
Hey, are you ready for ...... Hyperion? Gates, open.
It's ready to take off now!
The Hyperion is ready, let's go!
Understand that the gates are open.
"Alert! Alert! The camp is under attack!"
「警報！警報！基地が攻撃を受けました！」
"Alert! Alert! The base is under attack!"
"Alert! Warning! The base is under attack!"
Alarm! Alarm! The base has been attacked!
A large number of Houkai appear near the camp! We are surrounded!
报告！基地附近发现大量崩坏生物！我们被包围了！
報告します！基地の周囲で大量の崩壊生物を発見！包囲されています！
보고합니다! 기지 주변에서 대량의 붕괴 생물을 발견! 포위되었습니다!
Report! A large number of Honkai beasts have been spotted near the base! We are surrounded!
Report! A large number of collapsed creatures have been spotted near the base! We are surrounded!
Report! We have a large number of decaying organisms around the base! We are surrounded!
What?! I can't believe they're here already....
What! I can't believe it's so soon ......
No way!!! I can't believe how quickly .......
Hey, look! What is that up there?
喂！你们看！天上那个是什么东西！
ねぇ、見て！空のあれは何！？
Hey, look! What's that in the sky!?
Hey! Look! What is that thing in the sky!
Hey, look! What's that in the sky!
あれは……新種の崩壊生物！？
That's... A new species of Honkai beast?!
That's ...... a new kind of disintegrating organism!
Wat? How come such thing exists! Is it a dragon?!
怎！怎么会有这种东西……这个是龙么！？
なっ……何であんなのが……あれは……ドラゴン！？
What is that thing...? That's.... A dragon!?
How! How can there be such a thing ...... Is this a dragon!
What the ...... is that thing ...... that's a ...... dragon!
It's Mei!  The thunderstorm in the sky... could it be Mei?
芽衣姐姐！天空中的雷暴云…难道是芽衣姐姐么！
上空の雷雲……もしかして芽衣お姉ちゃんじゃない！？
상공의 뇌운…… 설마 메이 언니가 아니야!?
There's thunderclouds in the sky... Is that Mei!?
Meiko-neechan! The thunderstorm clouds in the sky...could it be Meiko-san!
Thunderclouds in the sky above: ...... Maybe it's not Mei's sister!
Seele! Spread the message to all! Abandon the camp and go aboard! We must retreat now!
希儿！传达给所有人！放弃基地全部登船！我们得立刻撤离！
ゼーレ！全員に伝えてください！基地を捨てて全員ハイペリオンへ乗船！ただちにここを離れます！
제레! 전원에게 전해 주세요! 기지를 버리고 전원 히페리온에 승선! 즉시 여기를 떠납니다!
Seele! Inform everyone! Abandon the base and board the Hyperion! We need to evacuate immediately!
Hill! Pass it on to everyone! Abandon base and board all ships! We need to evacuate immediately!
Seele! Tell everyone! Abandon base and all aboard the Hyperion! We're leaving immediately!
Waaaa... Let, Let me on first!
Woohoo...let! Let me go up first!
Yssring, get the f**k off! Let the kids board first! Come to move the injured now!
伊瑟琳！你OO给我下来！让孩子们先登船！给我去搬伤员！
イザーリン！このバカ、降りてこい！子どもたちを先に乗せろ！負傷者を運ぶの手伝え！
이자린! 이 바보야, 내려와! 아이들을 먼저 태워! 부상자를 운반하는 걸 도와!
Yiserin, get the ☆☆ down! Let the children board the ship first! Help me carry the wounded!
Estherine! You get down here! Let the children board first! Get me the wounded!
Estherine! You idiot, get down here! Get the kids on first! Help me carry the wounded!
Calm down! Just leave your things there! Queue up! Combatants should fend off the Houkai beasts in front of the gate with me! We must guarantee Hyperion's successful launch!
大家冷静！不要管物品了！有序登船！战斗人员跟我一起清理闸门前的崩坏生物！我们要保证休伯利安出站！
みなさん冷静に！持ち物には構わず、慌てず乗船してください！戦闘員は私と一緒にゲート前へ！崩壊生物を退治し、ハイペリオンが出航できるようにします！
여러분 침착하게! 소지품은 신경 쓰지 말고 당황하지 말고 승선해 주세요! 전투원은 나와 함께 게이트 앞으로! 붕괴생물을 퇴치하고 히페리온이 출항할 수 있게 하겠습니다!

Everybody calm down! Leave the items alone! Board the ship in an orderly fashion! Combatants join me in clearing the gates of disintegrating creatures! We need to make sure that Hubertine leaves the station!

Everyone stay calm! Don't worry about your belongings, and don't panic, get on board! Combatants, come with me to the gate! We will exterminate the disintegrating organisms so that Hyperion can set sail!
Go! Let us lend her a helping hand and stave off those beasts!
走！我们去帮姐姐大人！一定要挡住崩坏生物！
行こう！お姉ちゃんを助けないと！崩壊生物を食い止めよう！
가자! 언니를 구해야 해! 붕괴생물을 막아내자!
Let's go! We have to help Bronya! Stop those Honkai beasts!
Go! Let's go help Sister-sama! We must block the collapse creatures!
Let's go! We have to save your sister! We have to stop the disintegrating organisms!
158: tada-da-da-da (sound made by vehicles rolling on the floor and rolling off the top of a tall building)
Strong Houkai Energy detected above the camp! We're being locked on by the Herrscher!
姐姐大人！基地上空发现强烈的崩坏能反应！我们已经被律者锁定了！
お姉ちゃん！基地の上空に強烈な崩壊エネルギー反応！もう律者が来たみたい！
언니! 기지 상공에 강렬한 붕괴 에너지 반응! 이미 율자가 온 것 같아!
Bronya! There's a strong Honkai reaction over the base! I think the Herrscher's already found us!
Sister-sama! A strong disintegration energy reaction has been detected over the base! We've been locked on by the Ruler!
Sis! There's a strong disintegrating energy reaction over the base! I think the scribe has already arrived!
Is everyone on the ship now?
Hang on! There are still some injured left!
等下！还有一些伤员没有登船！
待ってくれ！まだ負傷者が残ってる！
Hang on! There's still some injured left!
Wait a minute! There are still some wounded who have not been boarded!
We can't wait any longer! Hyperion must take off now! Or it'll be turned into ashes with the camp!
来不急了！休伯利安号必须马上出发！不然就等着和基地一起化成灰吧！
くそっ、間に合わない！今すぐ発進しないと基地もろともハイペリオンまで灰になるわよ！
젠장, 시간이 안 돼! 지금 바로 출발하지 않으면 기지와 함께 히페리온까지 재가 되고 말 거야!
Damn it, we don't have any time left! If we don't launch now, the base and Hyperion will be reduced to ashes!
There's no time to lose! The USS Huberian must depart now! Or we'll turn to dust with the base!
Damn it, we'll never make it! If we don't launch now, the base and Hyperion will be reduced to ashes!
Hyperion! Main gun ready to shoot! Eliminate all those despicable Houkai beasts in the way!
休伯利安！主炮准备发射！给我把挡在前面的崩坏渣滓杀干净！
ハイペリオン、主砲発射用意！前方を遮ってる崩壊生物どもを一掃してやるわ！
히페리온, 주포 발사 준비! 전방을 막고 있는 붕괴 생물들을 일소해 주겠어!
Hyperion! Prepare to fire the main cannon! We'll wipe out the Honkai scum in our way!
Hubertine! Main gun ready to fire! Kill the scum of the collapse in my way!
Hyperion, prepare to fire main cannon! We'll wipe out those disintegrating creatures blocking our advance!
Himeko! There are still combatants up there!
姬子！前方还有战斗人员！
姫子！だめです！前方にはまだ戦闘員が——！
히메코! 안 돼요! 전방에는 아직 전투원이 ——!
Himeko! No, no, no! There are still fighters up ahead!
いやっ！だめーーーーーっ！！
啊…啊……不…为什么……大家……姬子！！！
あ……あ……だめ……どうして……みんな……姫子！！！
아…… 아…… 안 돼…… 왜…… 다들……히메코！！！
Bronya! Hang in there! Don't let it get to you! Go aboard with Seele now!
布洛妮娅！振作点！快和希儿上船！
ブローニャ！しっかりなさい！ゼーレ、ブローニャを！
Bronya! Pull yourself together! Board with Seele now!
Bronya! Pull yourself together! Get on board with Hill!
Bronya! Stay with me! Seele, get Bronya!
No! We shouldn't leave anyone behind!
不！我们不能丢下任何人！
だめです！誰一人捨ててはいけません！
안 돼요! 누구 한 사람도 버려선 안 돼요!
No! We can't just leave them to die!
No! We can't leave anyone behind!
No, you can't! No one must be thrown away!
お姉ちゃん！このままじゃ、みんな死んじゃう！
Bronya! If we don't get on board, we're going to die!
Sis! If we don't do something, we'll all die!
I'm gonna bring the others here together!
全員、連れていきます！ブローニャはあきらめません。
전원 데려갈 거예요! 브로냐는 포기하지 않아요.
No! I'm going to bring them here! I won't give up!
We will take them all! Bronya will not give up.
ブローニャ戻りなさい！死にたいの！？
Get back here! Do you want to die!?
Get back here! You want to die!
Bronya, get back here! You want to die!
Tut! We've no time! Close the gate!
チッ……！時間がない！ハッチを閉めて！
Tsk.....! We're out of time! Close the hatch!
Tsk! There's no time for that! Close the hatch!
Tsk ......! We're running out of time! Close the hatch!
だめです！姫子、待ってください！
Bronya! Come here! We can't lose you!
姐姐大人！快上船！大家不能失去你！
お姉ちゃん！乗って！お姉ちゃんがいなくなったら、みんな希望を失う！
언니! 타! 언니가 없어지면 모두 희망을 잃어!
Bronya, get in! Everyone is depending on you!
Sister-sama! Get on board! Everyone can't lose you!
Sis! Get in! If sis is gone, we all lose hope!
Let go of me, Seele! I want to save the others! Let me go!
希儿！放开我！让我去救大家！快放开我！
ゼーレ、放しなさい！みんなを助けなければ！早く放して！
제레, 놓으세요! 모두를 구해야 해! 빨리 놓아!
Let go of me, Seele! We have to save everyone! Let go of me now!
Hill! Let go of me! Let me go and save everyone! Let go of me!
Seele, let go of me! We have to save everyone! Let go of me now!
What are you doing, Seele? Open the gate now, Himeko! Seele is still outside!
希儿你干什么！姬子快打开舱门！希儿还在外面！
ゼーレ、何をするんです！姫子、早くハッチを開けてください！ゼーレがまだ外に！
제레, 뭘 하는 거야! 히메코, 빨리 해치를 열어 주세요! 제레가 아직 밖에!
Hill, what are you doing? Himeko, open the hatch! Heer is still out there!
Seele, what are you doing! Himeko, open the hatch quickly! Seele is still outside!
I'm sorry, Bronya. Only you can lead us. Please live on with the others.
抱歉…姐姐大人，只有你才能带领大家…请和大家一起活下去。
ごめんね……みんなを率いていけるのはお姉ちゃんしかいない……みんなと一緒に生きて。他の人たちは私が助けるから。
미안해…… 모두를 이끌고 갈 수 있는 건 언니뿐이야…… 모두와 함께 살아. 다른 사람들은 내가 구할 테니까.
Sorry...Sister-sama, only you can lead the way...please live with everyone.
I'm sorry ...... only your sister can lead everyone ...... live with them. I will help the others.
だめっ、だめですっ！いけませんっ！いやぁっ！
안 돼, 안 돼요! 안 된다고요! 아니아아!
No, no, no! No! No! No! No!
So, it's gone... At least Bronya survives. That's great.
走掉了么……太好了，至少姐姐大人活下来了。
行ったね……良かった、お姉ちゃんだけでも生き延びて……。
....You've gone. Great, at least my sister survived...
Gone? ...... great, at least the sister adult survived.
You've gone. ...... Thank goodness your sister at least survived. ......
I'm sorry. I tried hard to be a cheerful girl to make everyone happy, but I couldn't do anything in the end...

ごめんなさい、ずっと明るく振る舞ってみんなを笑顔にしていたかったけど……結局最後は何もできなかった……。
미안해, 계속 밝은 척 하며 모두를 웃게 하고 싶었는데…… 결국 끝엔 아무것도 못했어…….
I'm sorry, I wanted to act cheerful and bring a smile to everyone's face, but in the end I couldn't do anything...
I'm sorry, I've been trying to play cheerful and make everyone smile, but in the end I couldn't do anything about it ......
I'm sorry, I wanted to act cheerful all the time and make everyone smile, but ...... in the end I couldn't do anything in the end. ......
At least, let me be a selfish girl at this very moment.
至少现在…让希儿自私一下吧。
せめて今だけは……ゼーレのわがままを許して。
At least for now.... Let me be selfish.
At least for now...let Hill be selfish.
Forgive ...... Seele's selfishness, at least for now.

啊…天空中的光芒……好漂亮……
Ah...the light in the sky ...... so beautiful ......

如果这不是代表毁灭的光景该有多好……

이게 붕괴 후의 광경이 아니었다면, 얼마나 좋았을까…….
If only it wasn't a scene of annihilation...
How nice it would be if this did not represent the light of destruction ......
How much better it would have been if this wasn't a post-collapse scene. ......

It's a shame I couldn't share this scenery with Bronya...
It's a shame that you can't watch it with your sister ......
I'm really sorry I couldn't see it with my sister. ......
